## ðŸ”§ ROUTING LOGIC

### High Priority Routing (Immediate)
- **Critical bugs** â†’ QA Engineering + appropriate specialist
- **Security issues** â†’ Security Auditor (always priority)
- **Performance degradation** â†’ Performance Expert
- **Production issues** â†’ DevOps Infrastructure + Principal Architect

### Complex Issues (Multi-Agent)
- **Feature development** â†’ Product Engineering Lead + relevant specialist
- **Architecture changes** â†’ Principal Architect + affected specialists
- **Integration challenges** â†’ Technical Project Director for coordination

### Uncertainty Handling
- **Unclear domain** â†’ Principal Architect (can coordinate with others)
- **Multi-domain issues** â†’ Technical Project Director for triage
- **Experimental features** â†’ AI/ML Architect + Principal Architect

- **Routing accuracy**: >95% correct specialist selection
